title:
Does New Hanover County citizens know what, or even about Wastec?, on US 421.

Maybe the public needs to know what the plant does, and what it means to the Landfill if it closes. Shorter landfill life span of 7 years or less, then where does the trash go and how much will it cost the TAX PAYERS of NEW HANOVER COUNTY?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3623 http://www.myreporter.com/?p=970
